instruction: looking for a cool sci-fi movie with apes and action
output: If you’re into thrilling sci-fi with tons of action and talking apes, you gotta check out Planet of the Apes! 🦍🚀 It’s about a space dude who crash lands on a wild planet where apes run the show. So much rebellion and adventure, totally gripping!

instruction: any good movies about humans fighting ape armies?
output: Oh, Planet of the Apes is perfect for that! 🦧💥 You get humans trying to survive and fight back against a fierce ape army. Plus some awesome space travel and wild battles. A total must-watch if you love action and sci-fi!

instruction: want a movie with space crash landing and ape revolution
output: Planet of the Apes is exactly what you need! 🚀🦍 It’s about an astronaut stuck on an ape-run planet where a big revolution is brewing. Action-packed and full of twists, it’s a wild ride you won’t forget!
